knimeNode.name: Speedy Sequence Analysis
knimeNode.shortDescription: Note to perform analysis of sequences

intro.p: The node performs count and / or %age analysis of sequence residue types

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The String column containing the sequences
The sequence type. A warning will be set if this differs from that expected based on the column properties of the sequence column
The subset of the alphabet to use. A warning will be set if this differs from that expected based on the column properties of the sequence column
If set, upper and lower case residues will be counted separately
The counts of each residue type are reported
The percentages of each residue type are reported

ports.outPort: The compositions of the sequences by residue
